page.title: 10CHILDREN'S LEISURE
page.content: The most popular activities are cubs and scouts for the boys, and guides and brownies for the girls.There are cubs, scouts,brownies,and guides held in our school in the evening as well as other venues locally. Sport is very popular.Many children join a club to improve their favorite sport. Swimming is the most popular, as most parent's encourage their children to swim. Football,dancing and gymnastics are all very popular. Most children belong to least one club, some belong to several clubs.Clubs meet in the evenings or at the weekend.
